title: Mastering Nonlinear Learning Design Grounded in Ecological Psychology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theories and Understanding of Teaching-Learning Methods
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to acquire innovative teaching methods utilizing ecological psychology and nonlinear dynamics principles in a mobile environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three task constraint manipulation strategies proposed in nonlinear pedagogy.
Learners can apply noise-induced metastable state techniques in instructional design within mobile environments.
Learners can design educational scenarios that promote self-organization processes through learner-environment interaction analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
